heatmap_generator_description: Generate a heatmap from a funscript file.
heatmap_generator_upload_error_descripti: Double check that your file is a valid Funscript file. Details: {error}
heatmap_generator_uploaded_files_descrip: Note that all uploaded files will be included in the heatmap image. If you want a multi-axis heatmap, upload either a combined multi-axis script, or all individual axis files. If you only want a heatmap for one axis, only upload one file.
heatmap_generator_error_message: An error occurred while generating the heatmap.
funscript_parse_error_description: Double check that your file is a valid Funscript file. Details: {error}
